TAB2.MESSAGE: BMI measures weight relative to height but ignores body composition, often misclassifying muscular or high-fat individuals. It is useful for general screening but not for accurately assessing health.
TAB2.ALERT: Height is required to calculate your BMI. Please provide it.
TAB2.INFO: BMI (Body Mass Index) is a simple index of weight-for-height used to classify underweight, overweight, and obesity in adults. It is calculated by dividing a person's weight in kilograms by the square of their height in meters.

INFO_ALERT.TITLE: Understanding Your Weight Loss Trend
